title: Prawns in chupe sauce with spicy mash
description: Delicious king prawns cooked in creamy sauce made with Peruvian chilli paste, served with spicy mash.
ingredients: 8 tsp panca chilli paste, or any smoked chilli paste
20 fresh giant king prawns, heads on, shell removed from tails
40g/1½oz fresh broad beans, cooked in boiling water until tender
200g/7oz queso fresco or feta cheese, cubed
